docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, April 21.--A further illustration of the extreme measures to which the Government has resorted in order to obtain tonnage for the rapid shipment of troops and supplies to France was shown today by a second list of restricted imports which...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, April 21.--A further illustration of the extreme measures to which the Government has resorted in order to obtain tonnage for the rapid shipment of troops and supplies to France was shown today by a second list of restricted imports which was issued by the War Trade Board.

headline.main: BANS MORE IMPORTS TO RELEASE SHIPS; New List of War Trade Board Is Expected to Free 157,000 Tons for War Purposes. GOES INTO EFFECT MAY 13 Further Restrictions Forecast with Idea of Diverting 1,000,000 Tons of Vessels. Big Saving in Tan Wood. LIST OF RESTRICTED IMPORTS NO. 2.

docs.snippet: LONDON, April 23.--Uruguay and Argenina are expected to declare war against Germany at an early date, according to Berlin advices, forwarded by the Exchange Telegraph correspondent at Amsterdam.
docs.lead_paragraph: LONDON, April 23.--Uruguay and Argenina are expected to declare war against Germany at an early date, according to Berlin advices, forwarded by the Exchange Telegraph correspondent at Amsterdam.

headline.main: COUNT ON ARGENTINA AND URUGUAY IN WAR; Germans Expect Formal Declarations by Both of TheseNations Soon.PREPARING PUBLIC OPINION Guatemala's Recent Action Puts Her Definitely in the Way,Says Mendez. Relations Recently More Tense. Guatemala Definitely In the War.

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, April 26.-- It is rumored here today that the German reply to Uruguay's inquiry as to whether the German Government considered that a state of war existed between Uruguay and Germany is an unsatisfactory one. It is expected an...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, April 26.-- It is rumored here today that the German reply to Uruguay's inquiry as to whether the German Government considered that a state of war existed between Uruguay and Germany is an unsatisfactory one. It is expected an official statement on this subject will be issued later.
docs.abstract: Germany's reply to Uruguayan inquiry regarded as unsatisfactory

headline.main: HEAR GERMANY FAILS TO SATISFY URUGUAY; Reply to Inquiry Regarding Seizing of Commission May CauseDeclaration of War.
